title: My pixel 4 can't receive google play system update.
content: My pixel 4 can't receive google play system update.it sucks at january.Although I know the April patch is the new one.When I try to search for update,it only gets "your device is up to date".I try to unlock or relock bootloader and wipe all my data even flash a factory image,but nothing help,it still tells me the January patch is up to date and can't get any updates
